title: Kill on Command
description: A new thriller, Kill on Command, introduces reluctant assassin Sean Garrison. Garrison, a happy go lucky Pittsburgh native, is suddenly thrust into an illegal CIA assassination program when he loses his job with an advertising agency. Against his will, he becomes a ruthless, blood thirsty assassin hell bent on the destruction of men his handlers see as a threat to the U.S. Along the way, a beautiful, but deadly CIA operative with an agenda of her own assists Garrison. She leads him on a roller coaster ride of death and destruction as he struggles to figure out who he is and what he has become.
author: Slaton Smith
